name: Zaynix-MD
description: Zaynix-cMD WhatsApp bot made by ROMEK-XD

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter the WhatsApp number of the bot owner (e.g., 919341xxxx).

MODE.description: Bot mode: public, private, or group.

PREFIX.description: Command prefix used to trigger the bot (e.g., . or !).

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Set to true to auto view WhatsApp statuses.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Set to true to auto reply on viewed statuses.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Set to true to auto react to statuses.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Set the message used for auto status reply.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Set to true to enable custom emoji reactions.

AUTO_REACT.description: Set to true to auto react on every message.

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Set to true to automatically read WhatsApp statuses.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Set to true to enable automatic voice messages.

AUTO_STICKER.description: Set to true to enable automatic sticker generation.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Set to true to enable automatic replies to messages.

ALLWAYS_OFFLINE.description: Set to true to make the bot appear offline always.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Set to true to automatically read messages.

ANTI_LINK.description: Set to true to enable anti-link protection in chats.

ANTI_LINKK.description: Set to true to enable additional anti-link protection.

ANTI_BOT.description: Set to true to enable anti-bot measures.

ANTI_BAD.description: Set to true to filter out inappropriate content.
